title: Revenge of the Space Pirates
description: Cosmoe, Princess Dagger, Humphree, and the gang are back for another swashbuckling space adventure in the third hilarious illustrated novel of the Galactic Hot Dogs series, which Big Nate author Lincoln Peirce calls “an insanely entertaining, eye-popping adventure.”Secrets about Cosmoe and Big Humphree’s past are revealed during a twisty new adventure for the crew of the Neon Wiener, leading up to a major turning point in all of their lives aboard the intergalactic hot dog truck.
author: Max Brallier
